title: S3 Ep30: Crossing The Paranormal Communication Bridge w/Bill Chappell - Hr.2
itunes:title: Crossing The Paranormal Communication Bridge w/Bill Chappell - Hr.2
description: Investigator/Inventor/Scientist Bill Chappell joins Darkness Radio in the second hour of the program to explain how he has figured out a different way to communicate with the other side through his new device, the Paranormal Puck, and The Ovilus.  and how he has plans to rebuild Spiritcom.
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
